title: Eliminate sample data fallbacks in client streamers; require real backend streaming or surface an error state

steps: Set VITE_USE_STREAMING_DATASETS=true and valid VITE_SUPABASE_URL/VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY in .env
Run the app and open Network inspector: verify no requests to /data/*_sample.json
Temporarily break streaming (e.g., wrong key) and reload: UI should surface error state; status for datasets becomes 'error' without loading any mock data
Restore correct config: streaming resumes; data loads from Supabase Edge endpoints only
Optional: clear IndexedDB cache and verify behavior remains correct
